thread.title: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Is Again Expanding in Germany

author: Nicole Friedman
title: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Is Again Expanding in Germany

organizations.name: berkshire hathaway is again expanding in germany berkshire hathaway inc.
berkshire hathaway homeservices rubina real estate

text:
Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s real-estate brokerage network is adding its first international franchisee, in Berlin, broadening the conglomerate’s ties to Germany.
Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices is set to announce the addition of Berlin-based Rubina Real Estate GmbH to its franchise network on Monday, and Rubina will change its name to Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Rubina Real Estate next month.
